name: Nut
0:
”Alexa, open nut finder.”
”list my device.”
”find my key.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nut finder
des:
This skill can be used to find your Nut items through the voice commands of Amazon voice speakers.
Environmental preparation:
1. Install the Nut App on your mobile phone and log in to the Nut account to bind your Nut Bluetooth device.
2. Open the Amazon Speaker App, download and install this skill.
Using help:
First, please say to Alexa: "Alexa, open nut finder"
After the speaker answers, you can say: "list my device "
After the speaker answers, you can say: "find my key (replace with the name of the item in the Nut App)"
